ygData.subject: RE: Getting a good item!  and selling it
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Sheesh.  Go to a university library and look up the journal articles if you re still skeptical, and read for yourself exactly how these studies were done.
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 26 Jul 1999, Jones, Brian wrote:
>
> Um no offense John but studies can be doctored to look like anything someone
> wants to prove. They start with a simple question: "Are you happy since
> you won the lottery?" If they say no, continue on with the study. If
> they say yes, "Thanks for your time. Congratulations on your new found
> money!"

Sheesh. Go to a university library and look up the journal
articles if you're still skeptical, and read for yourself
exactly how these studies were done. This is not one study by
a crackpot, it's generally accepted truth in psychology/
sociology.

I don't know what else I can do to prove the point. Maybe I
should lie and say I'm wrong just to get this off the list...

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
